description: Oksana Lintz decides to activate the system's witness protocol, setting preparations for BCI to reveal historic logs and rationales in Halden's voice.
During ongoing city assembly negotiations, the BCI begins releasing audio and video messages in Halden's voice. Residents are stunned as the system contradicts Council narratives about past abuses.
The BCI issues public judgments and explanations on prior behavioral flaggings. Crowds gather at screens, sparking heated citywide debate over responsibility for the past system's conduct.
Ghost assembly leaders seize the moment, demanding urgent suspension of all secret BCI processes and calling for a referendum on algorithmic governance, fueling mass public mobilization.
Directorate officials attempt to disable the BCI during a live transmission, causing brief blackouts. Outrage grows as citizens blame Council members for trying to cover up the truth.
